Key Match Events: The White Sox swept the Angels with a 7-0 win.
Pre-Game Insights: Fans were hoping to watch one last train wreck, as the Sox were one loss away from breaking the MLB loss record.
Post-Match Reflections: Fans expressed disappointment and frustration with the team's performance, but also a sense of relief that the record was avoided.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The team's final home series drew large crowds, with fans trading Sox hats for paper bags over their heads and passing out 'Sell' t-shirts to spread the message to owner Jerry Reinsdorf.
Others: The Sox will now hit the road for a series against the playoff-hunting Detroit Tigers to close out the season.
